name: Cat Attack: Brick Breaker (Beta)
description:
Description: You see this cat? You are this cat. Your one goal in life is to wreak havoc and have fun while doing it (by causing problems for the humans around you). Break all the fragile glasses while innocently playing with a ball of yarn.

Directions: Hit Space or Click to Start. Use the Arrow Keys to Move the Cat from Left to Right to Bounce the Ball into the Glasses and watch them shatter to pieces. Don't let the Ball get Past the Cat, or it's Game Over. 

Credits to Assets:

Tutorial: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLClYkAqkRMPw7j1gv_rH0Z6WBmuOXN8HP

Game Sounds: 50 Menu Interface SFX by ColorAlpha

Sprite: Cats || Pixel Asset Pack

Cat Sound: 🐈 All Minecraft Cat Sounds | Sound Effects for Editing 🔊

Glass Sound: Glass Breaking ( Minecraft) - Sound Effect 

 Background Image: Pixel Pink Wallpapers
